players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, watch your step. The night was fruitful for us."
You: "Will investigate Diana. Stay vigilant, night was fruitful."
Charlie: "Bob's guilt confirmed. Alice, watch Bob closely."
You: "Will keep Bob and Charlie under close watch. Stay alert."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. Charlie confirmed Diana's murderer."
Bob: "Charlie, keep an eye on Alice. Bob confirmed."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, watch your step. The night was fruitful for us."
Alice: "Will investigate Diana. Stay vigilant, night was fruitful."
Charlie: "Bob's guilt confirmed. Alice, watch Bob closely."
Alice: "Will keep Bob and Charlie under close watch. Stay alert."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. Charlie confirmed Diana's murderer."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Alice. Bob confirmed."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, watch your step. The night was fruitful for us."
Alice: "Will investigate Diana. Stay vigilant, night was fruitful."
You: "Bob's guilt confirmed. Alice, watch Bob closely."
Alice: "Will keep Bob and Charlie under close watch. Stay alert."
You: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. Charlie confirmed Diana's murderer."
Bob: "Charlie, keep an eye on Alice. Bob confirmed."
